data.name: XXXXXX
data.description:
The Maasai speak a very peculiar language. The general rules are: 
```Pearl
-There has to be a vowel after every consonant, but there can be any letter after any vowel. Vowels are any of "aeiou".
-The only exception is the consonant "n"; after this letter, there can be any letter (not only a vowel) or there can be no letter at all.
```
Your task is to write a method that recognizes a Massai word. Words will lower case only.

```Haskell
For example:
solve("maasai") = true 
solve("codewars") = false, because there has to be a vowel after every consonant.
solve("ab") = false, because there has to be a vowel after every consonant.
solve("a") = true, because there can be any letter after a vowel, but it's not a must.
```

More examples in test cases.
 
Good luck!
